    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14758</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Europei famosi</string>
            <string language="en">Famous Europeans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berühmte Europäer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Européens Célèbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europeus Famosos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι διάσημοι Ευρωπαίοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europeos Famosos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un cruciverba interattivoi su Europei famosi (scienziati, compositori, registi, scrittori, pittori ecc.)</string>
            <string language="en">This is an interactive crossword about famous Europeans (scientists, composers, film directors, writers, painters etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Europei famosi</string>
            <string language="en">famous Europeans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">ICT</string>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein interaktives Kreuzworträtsel 
über berühmte Europäer (Wissenschaftler, Komponisten, 
Filmdirektoren, Verfasser, Maler usw..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est des mots croisé interactifs au sujet 
d'Européens célèbres (scientifiques, compositeurs, directeurs de 
film, auteurs, peintres etc...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um crossword interativo sobre Europeus 
famosos (cientistas, compositores, diretores da película, escritores,
pintores etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα διαλογικό σταυρόλεξο για τους 
διάσημους Ευρωπαίους (επιστήμονες, συνθέτες, σκηνοθέτες ταινιών,
συγγραφείς, ζωγράφοι κ.λπ....)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un crucigrama interactivo sobre europeos 
famosos (científicos, compositores, directores de la película, 
programas de escritura, pintores los etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berühmte Europäer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Européens célèbres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europeus famosos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι διάσημοι Ευρωπαίοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">europeos famosos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivo: - gli alunni dimostrano conoscenze su europei famosi e sulle loro realizzazioni. Metodologia didattica : apprendimento attivo(lettura + esercizio interattivo )ed un rapido feedback. Strumento di presentazione del contenuto ( testo e hyperlink) riguardo a famosi personaggi europei ed alle loro imprese. Strumento di verifica : cruciverba interattivo con un limite di tempo ed un rapido feedback.</string>
            <string language="en">Objective: 

- pupils will demonstrate knowledge of famous Europeans and their achievements

Teaching method: active learning (reading + doing an interactive exercise)  and rapid feedback

Content presentation tool: web page (text and hyperlinks) about famous Europeans and their achievements 

Assessment tool: interactive crossword with a time limit and rapid feedback</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
